languages.text: {n}Эклендиль кивает.{/n} "Я счастлив вновь пребывать в окружении тех, с кем делил цветение Крудараха, Муаран".
{n}Eklendyl nods.{/n} "I am elated to be once more among those with whom I shared Crudarach's time of bloom, Muaran."
languages.original_text: {n}Эклендиль кивает.{/n} "Я счастлив вновь пребывать в окружении тех, с кем делил цветение Крудараха, Муаран".

traits.locale_text: {n}Eklendyl nods.{/n} "I am elated to be once more among those with whom I shared Crudarach's time of bloom, Muaran."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}埃克伦迪点了点头。{/n}“我很高兴能与克鲁达拉赫的荣耀子民再度重逢，穆兰。”
languages.original_text: {n}Eklendyl nods.{/n} "I am elated to be once more among those with whom I shared Crudarach's time of bloom, Muaran."

traits.locale_text: {n}埃克伦迪点了点头。{/n}“我很高兴能与克鲁达拉赫的荣耀子民再度重逢，穆兰。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}エクレンディルは頷いた。{/n}「クルダラの隆盛期を共に過ごした仲間と再び時を過ごす事が出来、心から嬉しいよ、ムアラン」
languages.original_text: {n}Eklendyl nods.{/n} "I am elated to be once more among those with whom I shared Crudarach's time of bloom, Muaran."

traits.locale_text: {n}エクレンディルは頷いた。{/n}「クルダラの隆盛期を共に過ごした仲間と再び時を過ごす事が出来、心から嬉しいよ、ムアラン」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Eklendyl asiente.{/n} «Me alegro de poder estar de nuevo con aquellos con quienes compartí el florecimiento de Crudarach, Muaran».
languages.original_text: {n}Eklendyl nods.{/n} "I am elated to be once more among those with whom I shared Crudarach's time of bloom, Muaran."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eklendyl asiente.{/n} «Me alegro de poder estar de nuevo con aquellos con quienes compartí el florecimiento de Crudarach, Muaran».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Eklendyl nickt.{/n} "Ich bin hocherfreut, wieder unter denen zu sein, mit denen ich Crudarachs Blütezeit geteilt habe, Muaran."
languages.original_text: {n}Eklendyl nods.{/n} "I am elated to be once more among those with whom I shared Crudarach's time of bloom, Muaran."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eklendyl nickt.{/n} "Ich bin hocherfreut, wieder unter denen zu sein, mit denen ich Crudarachs Blütezeit geteilt habe, Muaran."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Eklendyl hoche la tête.{/n} « Je suis ravi d'être de nouveau parmi ceux avec qui j'ai vécu l'heure de gloire de Crudarach, Muaran. »
languages.original_text: {n}Eklendyl nods.{/n} "I am elated to be once more among those with whom I shared Crudarach's time of bloom, Muaran."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eklendyl hoche la tête.{/n} « Je suis ravi d'être de nouveau parmi ceux avec qui j'ai vécu l'heure de gloire de Crudarach, Muaran. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Eklendyl başını sallıyor.{/n} "Crudarach'ın altın çağını paylaştığım kimselerle yeniden bir araya gelmek şereftir Muaran."
languages.original_text: {n}Eklendyl nods.{/n} "I am elated to be once more among those with whom I shared Crudarach's time of bloom, Muaran."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eklendyl başını sallıyor.{/n} "Crudarach altın zamanlarını paylaştığım kimselerle yeniden bir araya gelmek bir şeref Muaran."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
